Key Match Events: Kawhi Leonard made his season debut against the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday.
The Clippers showed exactly what the fans were hoping for with Leonard back, bolting to a 20-point halftime lead as they cruise to a much-needed victory after losing their last two games.
Pre-Game Insights: Fans have only been able to imagine what this team is capable of with their superstar forward in the lineup.
Post-Match Reflections: Leonard ended his night with 12 points on 4-11 shooting in just 19 minutes as the Clippers eased him back into action.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Many top NBA pages reposted Kawhi's first basket of the season to welcome him back.
The Clippers have a 19-15 record and are sitting in seventh place in the West, as fans have only been able to imagine what this team is capable of with their superstar forward in the lineup.
Others: Kawhi Leonard sized up against Hawks standout rookie Zaccharie Risacher and drilled a three-pointer right in the face of the 2024 first-overall pick.
